results.name: Floor((n-1)!/n).
comment: (h-1)!/h is integer if h belongs to A056653.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
xref: Cf. A001048 ((n+1)!/n), A056653, A091330 (floor((p-1)!/p), where p is prime), A175787 (prime numbers together with 4).
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 31 2013
